Interface RMISystem.net.KeyDatabase

public interface interface KeyDatabase
extends Remote
Instances of this class hold keys which can be used to verify the identity of another object. The key space is represented as a tuple: < object name, key >

getKey(String)
Get the key for the specified object name.
validateKey(String)
Validate the specified key.

getKey 
 public abstract String getKey(String objectName) throws RemoteException, AccessException, NoSuchElementException, IOException
Get the key for the specified object name.

validateKey 
 public abstract boolean validateKey(String key) throws RemoteException, AccessException, IOException
Validate the specified key.
